long_description: The moto-inspired Kuhl Dfynce soft-shell jacket is a great choice when you want weather-ready performance for urban adventures. It keeps the wind out, repels light rain and is incredibly comfortable. 4-way-stretch nylon/spandex shuts out the wind, sheds precipitation and is durable without being rough or heavy. Side and underarm smooth-face knit panels are extra soft and stretchy, highly breathable and moisture wicking. Fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish for water resistance and quick drying. Interior windflap backs the front zipper. Gusseted cuffs close with zippers. Kuhl Dfynce jacket has zip hand pockets and a zip chest pocket.
short_description: The moto-inspired Kuhl Dfynce soft-shell jacket is a great choice when you want weather-ready performance for urban adventures. It keeps the wind out, repels light rain and is incredibly comfortable.
